an3.56:1.1: Atha kho annataro brahmanamahasalo yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so brahmanamahasalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.56:1.2: “sutam metam, bho gotama, pubbakanam brahmananam vuddhanam mahallakanam acariyapacariyanam bhasamananam:
an3.56:1.3: ‘pubbe sudam ayam loko avici manne phuto ahosi manussehi, kukkutasampatika gamanigamarajadhaniyo’ti.
an3.56:1.4: Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yenetarahi manussanam khayo hoti, tanuttam pannayati, gamapi agama honti, nigamapi anigama honti, nagarapi anagara honti, janapadapi ajanapada honti”ti?
an3.56:2.2: Te adhammaragaratta visamalobhabhibhuta micchadhammapareta tinhani satthani gahetva annamannam jivita voropenti, tena bahu manussa kalam karonti.
an3.56:2.3: Ayampi kho, brahmana, hetu ayam paccayo yenetarahi manussanam khayo hoti, tanuttam pannayati, gamapi agama honti, nigamapi anigama honti, nagarapi anagara honti, janapadapi ajanapada honti.
an3.56:3.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, etarahi manussa adhammaragaratta visamalobhabhibhuta micchadhammapareta.
an3.56:3.2: Tesam adhammaragarattanam visamalobhabhibhutanam micchadhammaparetanam devo na sammadharam anuppavecchati.
an3.56:3.3: Tena dubbhikkham hoti dussassam setatthikam salakavuttam.
an3.56:3.5: Ayampi kho, brahmana, hetu ayam paccayo yenetarahi manussanam khayo hoti, tanuttam pannayati, gamapi agama honti, nigamapi anigama honti, nagarapi anagara honti, janapadapi ajanapada honti.
an3.56:4.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, etarahi manussa adhammaragaratta visamalobhabhibhuta micchadhammapareta.
an3.56:4.2: Tesam adhammaragarattanam visamalobhabhibhutanam micchadhammaparetanam yakkha vale amanusse ossajjanti, tena bahu manussa kalam karonti.
an3.56:4.3: Ayampi kho, brahmana, hetu ayam paccayo yenetarahi manussanam khayo hoti, tanuttam pannayati, gamapi agama honti, nigamapi anigama honti, nagarapi anagara honti, janapadapi ajanapada honti”ti.
an3.56:5.2: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
